spells.name: Delay Poison, Communal
spells.description: As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Flash Fire
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm creates a tremendous flash capable of blinding the weapon's bearer and those around him.

spells.name: Healing Thief
spells.description: You siphon half of all magical healing that the targeted creature receives.

spells.name: Hostile Levitation
spells.description: Levitates the targeted creature up off the ground.

spells.name: Locate Weakness
spells.description: You roll damage twice when you roll damage for a critical hit and take the best damage.

spells.name: Pup Shape
spells.description: Transforms a single animal or magical beast into a younger and cuter version of itself for a short period of time.

spells.name: Returning Weapon, Communal
spells.description: As returning weapon, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.
